channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Hackers distribute thousands of phishing attacks through Mimecast's secure-link feature
item.description: A legitimate feature is being abused to hide phishing emails and have them land in inboxes.

item.title: Xiaomi casse déjà le prix de son nouveau smartphone haut de gamme, le surpuissant Poco F8 Ultra
item.description: Alors qu'il vient à peine d'être lancé, le Xiaomi Poco F8 Ultra s'offre déjà une baisse drastique de prix sur le site officiel de la marque, avec une première remise immédiate de 200 euros et une deuxième de 50 euros via un coupon, passant de 899 euros à 649 euros.

item.title: Open AI poaches Slack CEO as its chief revenue officer
item.description: Slack's CEO has just moved over to a new role in OpenAI, but it's not as CEO.

item.description: Lib Dem peer highlights risks of free VPNs in House of Lords

item.title: The Third ’28 Years Later’ Movie Is Actually Happening
item.description: Danny Boyle directs, Alex Garland writes, and Cillian Murphy is likely to star.

item.title: Marvel Rivals Season 5.5 launch: our live coverage of the Rogue update, including downtime and release date
item.description: Here's our coverage of the launch of Marvel Rivals Season 5.5 as it happens. This includes a look at the release date, and the new Hero Rogue.

item.title: The Best Samsung Phones of 2025, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: From flagship and budget to flipping and folding, Samsung’s Galaxy range spans the breadth of the smartphone cosmos. WIRED’s here to help you make your choice.

item.title: How to watch Luke Littler at the 2026 PDC World Darts Championship online: FREE darts live streams, schedule
item.description: Luke Littler defends his title at Ally Pally, here's how to watch the Nuke at the 2026 World Darts Championship live streams online from anywhere in the world.

item.title: Unapologetically crass and filled with Gen Z slang — why this Prime Video anime is my latest obsession
item.description: New Panty & Stocking with Garterbelt is a Prime Video anime that should be at the top of your watch list.

item.title: Marble enters the race to bring AI to tax work, armed with $9 million and a free research tool
item.description: Marble, a startup building artificial intelligence agents for tax professionals, has raised $9 million in seed funding as the accounting industry grapples with a deepening labor shortage and mounting regulatory complexity.The round, led by Susa Ventures with participation from MXV Capital and Konrad Capital, positions Marble to compete in a market where AI adoption has lagged significantly behind other knowledge industries like law and software development."When we looked at the economy and asked ourselves where AI is going to transform the way businesses operate, we focused on knowledge indus...

item.title: The DJI Power 2000 portable power station is down to its lowest-ever price — almost half off
item.description: The DJI Power 2000 is on sale at Amazon for $699, down from the list price of $1,299. That's a 46% discount.

item.title: Xiaomi a sorti l’écran parfait pour combiner gaming et travail
item.description: Xiaomi enrichit son catalogue avec un nouvel écran PC, le Monitor A27i 2026. Ce moniteur de 27 pouces en Full HD joue la carte de la polyvalence, promettant une fluidité de 144 Hz et une excellente calibration d’usine pour séduire aussi bien les travailleurs de jour que les joueurs du soir. Sans OLED ni HDR, il vise surtout l’entrée de gamme efficace, à mi-chemin entre bureautique et gaming....

item.title: Security flaws in Freedom Chat app exposed users’ phone numbers and PINs
item.description: The founder of Freedom Chat said the company has reset user PINs and released a new version to app stores.

item.title: Zeekr 007 GT : on a essayé le break électrique chinois de 646 ch qui arrive en Europe et qui veut faire de l’ombre à l’Audi E5
item.description: On a eu la chance d'essayer la nouvelle Zeekr 007 GT. Une voiture électrique chinoise prévue pour l'Europe, qui se recharge en 10 minutes et dotée de 646 ch. Voici notre premier avis.

item.title: This Worm Was Chilling in a Lab for Years. Turns Out It’s a Record-Breaker
item.description: His name is B, and he lives in Virginia.

item.title: Wario’s one and only 3D platformer is now playable on Switch 2
item.description: Nintendo has been slowly drip-feeding us GameCube games since the console joined its Nintendo Classics offering when the Switch 2 launched in June, and we just got another one. Switch Online + Expansion Pack subscribers can now play Wario’s one and only 3D platformer on the service. Wario World launched in 2003 and was developed by Treasure (Gunstar Heroes, Ikaruga). You play as Wario, the flatulent antithesis of Nintendo’s primary mascot, in what is a combat-heavy platformer. Wario’s castle has been overthrown by an evil piece of sentient jewellery called Black Jewel, and it’s up to the garli...

item.title: I tried Photoshop in ChatGPT — it's an awesome free AI superpower
item.description: ChatGPT's new Photoshop, Acrobat, and Express features are excellent, and best of all, they're free

item.title: Pick up our favorite Anker MagSafe power bank while it's on sale for 34 percent off
item.description:
If you're traveling for the holidays, there are few things more useful to take with you than a portable charger. Whether you're using your phone for music and navigation on a long drive or music and logistics before, during and after a flight, you'll want it to stay alive for the entire door-to-door journey. A number of our favorites — like this Anker MagGo 10K bank — are on sale right now for record-low, or close to them, prices.
Even better, the Anker MagGo power bank is currently on sale for $60, down from $90. This 34 percent discount brings the power bank to only $5 more than its all-ti...

item.title: AI chip and tech stocks are falling again after gloomy Oracle earnings reignite bubble fears. Here’s the latest
item.description: Shares in tech companies ranging from Nvidia to Meta Platforms are down on Thursday amid growing concerns around AI-fueled circular spending. Today, investors are waking up to red on their screens as many tech and AI stocks are dropping in premarket trading.

item.title: Google DeepMind partners with the UK government for 'science breakthroughs, cleaner energy'
item.description: Google continues to invest in the UK, this time with a new DeepMind research facility.

item.description: The Galaxy Z TriFold will support the Second Screen feature in the same way that Samsung's Android tablets do.

item.title: Spotify just launched its most powerful playlist creator yet – here are 3 things you should know about Prompted Playlists
item.description: Spotify just revealed a new feature that lets you create playlists that refresh frequently, and I'm beyond excited.

item.title: Spotify vous donne la main sur son algorithme : ce que ça change
item.description: Spotify dévoile une fonction destinée à ses utilisateurs Premium leur permettant d'influencer l'algorithme pour créer des playlists à leur goût.

item.title: La nouvelle enceinte connectée Amazon qui se mue en barre de son Dolby Atmos est déjà en promotion
item.description: L’Amazon Echo Studio millésime 2025 est une enceinte connectée haut de gamme, certifiée Dolby Atmos dans un format compact. Parfaite au cœur d’un écosystème Alexa, elle peut même jouer les mini home cinéma. Sortie il y a moins de deux mois, elle s’affiche déjà en promo : de 239,99 euros à 214,99 euros sur Amazon.

item.title: The Daily Show slams Trumps treatment of women journalists
item.description: "The Daily Show" host Desi Lydic took aim at Donald Trump's treatment of female reporters, calling out the president's repeated misogynist insults.

item.title: The Next ‘Hunger Games’ Is Bringing Back Jennifer Lawrence and Josh Hutcherson
item.description: Plus, get a tiny glimpse of 'Supergirl' before today's trailer.

item.title: Google's Gemini AI comes to Chrome on iPhone and iPad
item.description: After rolling it out on desktop and Android earlier in 2025, Google is finally bringing its built-in Gemini AI experience to iPhone and iPad. It offers new features like summarizing pages and helping you test your knowledge about a subject you're learning. As with any AI tool, though, it shouldn't be trusted for anything important given the possibility of hallucinations and other errors. When it arrives on your iOS device, tapping the spark icon at the left of the address bar (in place of the Google Lens camera) brings up a "Pages tool" that offers Lens and the new feature, "Ask Gemini." You ...

item.title: 6 Best Costco TVs That We’ve Tried and Recommend (2025)
item.description: Costco fans rejoice. We’ve found great deals on televisions exclusively for members.

item.title: Operation Bluebird Wants to Bring ‘Twitter’ Back to Life
item.description: Elon Musk “bid adieu to the Twitter brand” in 2023 in favor of X. A startup wants to resurrect it.

item.title: The Game Awards are losing their luster
item.description: It's Game Awards season, y'all. That special time of the year when we gather together to celebrate video games and the people who make them… by watching expensive commercials briefly punctuated by the odd awards speech or musical performance. For better or worse, The Game Awards is the biggest night on the video game event […]

item.title: Interest in Spoor’s bird monitoring AI software is soaring
item.description: Spoor's computer vision software can help wind farms, and other industries, track bird populations and migration patterns.

item.title: Eclipse Energy’s microbes can turn idle oil wells into hydrogen factories
item.description: The biotech startup is betting that owners of abandoned oil wells will use the tech to squeeze energy out of their wells.

item.title: Opera wants you to pay $20 a month to use its AI-powered browser Neon
item.description: Following a couple of months' testing, Opera has finally made its AI-powered browser, Neon, available to the public — though you'll have to shell out for a $19.90-per-month subscription to use it.

item.title: Opera Neon is now available, and I think it's an AI subscription worth paying for
item.description: Opera Neon is an AI web browser that lets you make your own version of the internet, and I'm shocked by how much I enjoyed using it.

item.title: The powerful Dell 16 Plus laptop is back to its lowest ever price
item.description: The all-new Dell 16 drops back to its record-low price on the official Dell website.

item.title: Samsung divulgâche la principale nouveauté de ses Galaxy S26
item.description: Samsung semble avoir vendu la mèche avant l’heure. Alors que la présentation officielle du Galaxy S26 Ultra n’est attendue qu’en février 2026, la fiche d’un nouveau chargeur 60 W publiée sur le site du constructeur laisse peu de place au doute : le futur fleuron sud-coréen devrait enfin profiter d’une vitesse de charge en nette hausse, après plusieurs générations limitées à 45 W....

item.title: Most leaders misread generational tension. These 5 habits resolve it
item.description: The first step is to look in the mirror. I spend most days in rooms where four generations argue about the same spreadsheet.
